alert.note: Alert for Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:27PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of west central Ziebach and northeastern Meade Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 626 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary along a line extending from Opal to 2 miles west of Red Owl to 9 miles south of Fairpoint. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Red Owl and Opal around 630 PM MDT. White Owl around 640 PM MDT. Enning and Marcus around 645 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Plainview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building as these winds approach. Strong wind gusts will likely occur without accompanying precipitation. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Ziebach
